revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 80:;Sisois, son of Onnophris, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4 copper drachmas 4;;Horos, son of Petheus, grandson of Aunes, mother Eserempis, copper drachmas 8;;Harsiesis, son of Petheus, grandson of Harsiesis, mother Thatres, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 16 obols 28.;(Epeiph) 11 likewise:;Petheus, son of Onnophris, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapetsooukis, copper drachmas 4 obols 28;;Onnophris, son of Sisois, grandson of Petsiris, mother Thaesis, copper drachmas 4;;Herakles, son of Sokrates, grandson of Phasis, mother Tapetheus, copper drachmas 4;;Phaesis, son of Heras, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Isidora, drachmas 4;;in total drachmas 16 obols 28.;(Epeiph) 18:;Satabous, son of Petheus, grandson of Satabous, mother Tapetaus, copper drachmas 4;;Phasis, son of Tesenouphis, grandson of Harphaesis, mother Thaesis, copper drachmas 4;;Pasion, son of Petsiris, grandson of Pasion, mother Thases, copper drachmas 4;;Esouris, son of Petheus, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Ptolema, obols 28;;Ptolemaios, son of Satabous, grandson of Horos, mother Theonis, drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Ptolema, drachmas 4;;Petesouchos, son of Petheus, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Stiynchis, drachmas 8;;Petaus, his brother with the same mother, obols 12 copper obols 16;;Heron, son of Onnophris, grandson of Theabennis, mother Tapetheus, copper drachmas 4;;Horion, son of Petheus, grandson of Esouris, mother Komonis, copper drachmas 4;;Heron, son of Petesouchos, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 8;;Euhemeros, son of Aunes, grandson of Aunes, mother Tepheros, copper drachmas 4 obols 28;;in total for the day drachmas 56 obols 26.;(Epeiph) 19 likewise:;Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Tanesneus, drachmas 4 copper obols 28;;Petaus, son of Sisois, grandson of Satabous, mother Thermouthis, copper drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Thaisas, drachmas 8;;Sarapion, son of Perigenes, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Tanais, copper drachmas 4;;Heron, son of Sabeinos, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Gaia, drachmas 12;;Sisois, son of Petesouchos, grandson of Herakles, mother Tkonnos, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Nestosiris, grandson of Petheus, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4 copper drachmas 4;;Syros, son of Onnophris, grandson of Maron, mother Tkollainis, drachmas 8 copper drachmas 4;;Pnepheros, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Thakialis, copper drachmas (that of priests) 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Taptosiris, copper drachmas (that of priests) 4;;Heraklas, son of Apollonios, grandson of Heraklas, mother Taorsenouphis, drachmas 4 copper drachmas 4;;Abykis, son of Demas, grandson of Abykis, mother Taonnophris, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Pakysis, grandson of Petheus, mother Tamaron, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 84 obols 28."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
